sqlMap.select: SELECT subtest.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, subtest.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, subtest.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, subtest.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, subtest.VERSION as version, subtest.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, subtest.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, subtest.SUBJECT as subject, subtest.GRADE as grade, subtest.SAMPLE as sample, subtest.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, subtest.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, subtest.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, subtest.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, subtest.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, subtest.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, subtest.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, subtest.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, subtest.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, subtest.CREATED_BY as createdBy, subtest.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, subtest.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, subtest.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, subtest.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, subtest.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, subtest.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, subtest.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, subtest.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, subtest.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId FROM ITEM_SET subtest WHERE subtest.ITEM_SET_ID = #value#

SELECT DISTINCT subtest.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, subtest.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, subtest.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, subtest.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, subtest.VERSION as version, subtest.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, subtest.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, subtest.SUBJECT as subject, subtest.GRADE as grade, subtest.SAMPLE as sample, subtest.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, subtest.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, subtest.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, subtest.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, subtest.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, subtest.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, subtest.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, subtest.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, subtest.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, subtest.CREATED_BY as createdBy, subtest.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, subtest.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, subtest.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, subtest.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, subtest.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, subtest.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, subtest.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, subtest.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, subtest.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId, status.ITEM_SET_ORDER as itemSetOrder, status.recommended_level as recommendedLevel, status.validation_status as validationStatus, status.exemptions as exemptions, status.absent as absent, status.ability_score as abilityScore, status.sem_score as semScore, status.objective_score as objectiveScore, status.unscored as unscored FROM ITEM_SET subtest, TEST_ROSTER tr, TEST_ADMIN ta, ITEM_SET_ancestor parent, STUDENT_ITEM_SET_STATUS status, item_set_item isi, item, product prod WHERE tr.TEST_ROSTER_ID = #value# AND ta.TEST_ADMIN_ID = tr.TEST_ADMIN_ID AND parent.ancestor_ITEM_SET_ID = ta.ITEM_SET_ID AND subtest.ITEM_SET_ID = parent.ITEM_SET_ID AND subtest.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'TD' AND status.TEST_ROSTER_ID = tr.TEST_ROSTER_ID AND status.ITEM_SET_ID = parent.ITEM_SET_ID AND subtest.SAMPLE = 'F' and isi.item_Set_id = subtest.item_set_id and item.item_id = isi.item_id and item.item_type != 'RQ' and status.completion_status not in ('IN', 'IP') and prod.product_id = ta.product_id AND (subtest.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL') ORDER BY status.ITEM_SET_ORDER
